mapper.select: SELECT gm_punish.id, gm_punish.user_id userId, gm_punish.role_id roleId, gm_punish.role_name roleName, gm_punish.is_jinyan isjinyan, gm_punish.is_fenhao isfenhao, gm_punish.operator_id createBy, gm_punish.operator_name createName, gm_punish.operation_type operationType, gm_punish.operation_reason msg, gm_punish.operation_time createDate, gm_punish.pid, gm_punish.server_id serverId, gm_punish.log_month, gm_punish.log_day, gm_punish.log_hour FROM gm_punish WHERE 1 = 1 and role_id = #{roleId} and role_name = #{roleName} and operation_time <= unix_timestamp(DATE_ADD(#{createDateEnd},INTERVAL 1 day))*1000 and operation_time >= unix_timestamp(#{createDateStart})*1000
